spell.name: Deductive Intuition
entries: You call upon your dragonmark's power to better uncover secrets. When you Cast the Spell, you can Recall Knowledge, Seek, or Sense Motive. You gain a +1 status bonus to the skill or Perception used for the roll, and this bonus remains as long as you Sustain the Spell.

3: You do not need to sustain Deductive Intuition

spell.name: Lesser Detector

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Lesser Detector, you choose to replicate Detect Poison, See Invisibility, or Object Reading. Lesser Detector gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Lesser Detector.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

dragonmark.greater: You may cast Lesser Detector up to two times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.grand: You may cast Lesser Detector up to three times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.siberys: You may cast Lesser Detector any number of times per daily preparation.
